findings.title: approve Function
findings.description: The approve function allows the owner to set an allowance for a specified address and amount.

findings.title: Transfer
findings.description: A non-whitelisted wallet can only transfer a specified number of tokens to a specified address.

findings.title: transferFrom
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in transferFrom function allowing non-whitelisted wallets to interact with the smart contract.

findings.title: Unprotected permit Function
findings.description: The permit function is marked as external and does not have any access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Swap Function Vulnerability
findings.description: Potential vulnerability found in swap function.

findings.title: Skim Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The skim function has been marked as vulnerable.

findings.title: Unprotected Initialize Function
findings.description: The initialize function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.
